text: Kaadu Ni-farmoytit (Malayka kinnuk) Nabii Luutul temeete waqdi, ken sabbatah rookiteeh kaxxam ceyteeh seehada ken yekkeleh isi marih umaané yaaxigeemih sabbatah, atu neh mamceesitinaay, marookitin nanu diggah koo kee ku-buxah mara finqak naggoysennok kaak iyyen, ku-barray raaqe marat raqtey finqite marâ luk finqitte akke waytek
